== Elanad (627755) ==

Elanad is a village in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 2140 hectares and harbouring 2467 households with total population of 10284 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Ottappalam]] is at a distance of 32 km. Male population is 4980 and female population is 5304. Scheduled Caste Population is 1942 and Scheduled Tribes population is 154. Census Location Code of the village is 627755<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
